title: Blogging using React & Appwrite
features: Designed and built a full‑stack React blogging platform powered by Appwrite, implementing secure JWT authentication, real‑time post CRUD, and image storage, achieving a 25% faster load time over the prototype.
Developed a reusable Rich Text Editor component with image upload, Markdown preview, and custom toolbar, increasing content authoring speed by 40% for contributors.
Established automated CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and Docker, enabling zero‑downtime deployments and reducing release cycle from 3 days to 6 hours.
